Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.helper

Class LocatorParser

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.helper.LocatorParser
public class LocatorParser extends Object
Utility class for parsing and handling locators in Selenium.

This class provides methods for extracting locators from exception messages, updating WebElement references, and converting locator strings into By objects.

Author:

      Parameters:

      element - The SmartWebElement to relocate.
      Returns:

    • extractBlockingElementLocator

      public static String extractBlockingElementLocator(String exceptionMessage)
      Extracts the blocking element locator from an exception message.
      Parameters:
      exceptionMessage - The exception message containing locator details.
      Returns:
      The XPath locator of the blocking element.

    • extractLocator

      public static org.openqa.selenium.By extractLocator(Object[] args)
      Extracts a locator from a given array of arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - The array containing locator arguments.
      Returns:
      The extracted By locator, or null if not found.

    • extractLocatorFromMessage

      public static String extractLocatorFromMessage(String message)
      Extracts a locator from an exception message.
      Parameters:
      message - The exception message.
      Returns:
      The extracted locator string, or a default message if not found.

      Retrieves detailed information about a WebElement.

      outerHtml - The outer HTML representation of the element.
      innerHtml - The inner HTML representation of the element.
      Returns:
